thread.title: Wells Fargo Fumbles Efforts to Repay Aggrieved Customers

author: Gretchen Morgenson
title: Wells Fargo Fumbles Efforts to Repay Aggrieved Customers

organizations.name: wells fargo fumbles efforts to repay aggrieved customers wells fargo & co.

text:
Wells Fargo & Co. is having trouble doing right by the customers it has wronged.
The big bank acknowledged that it recently sent out 38,000 erroneous communications to customers that it forced to buy unneeded auto insurance.
In some cases, according to two people briefed on the matter, Wells Fargo has also sent refunds to people who werenâ€™t...
